name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Cloud-Native Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **Kubernetes**, **Golang**, and **microservices architecture**, focusing on building robust and scalable cloud-native solutions. I am proficient in **containers** and have a strong grasp of **distributed systems**, ensuring high performance and reliability across applications. My expertise extends to **automation**, **testing**, and documentation, aligning with best practices and open-source methodologies to drive project success.
Additionally, I have extensive experience in the healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms with AI/ML capabilities, guiding teams in implementing **CI/CD** processes and utilizing cloud services including **Azure** and **AWS** to enhance operational efficiency. My commitment to team collaboration and customer engagement ensures that I deliver solutions that meet both technical and business requirements.
